card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Bolmeteus Steel Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Zack Pichi, Winged Dragon Admiral
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Armored Dragons and Fire Birds from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all the revealed cards were Dragons, this creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ■ When this creature would be discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put it instead.

card.name: Flame Shiva Double Cross, Blastdragon
card.text: ■ Your psychic creatures that cost 5 or less can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Dark Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Poppo "Yatarou" Pappi
card.text: ■ Saver: Dragon or Samurai creatures ''(When one of your Dragons or Samurai creatures would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)''

card.name: Boleas, Bird of Fire
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

card.name: Piara Heart
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 1000 or less.

card.name: Lyla Latta
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature is attacked, return a shield to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Reppi Aini
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from among them into your hand, then put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Guldan, Bird of Fire
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds. ■ Power attacker +4000 ■ Double Breaker
